pages.name: 橢球的焦點
pages.text: Use a $(l:bloodmagic:rituals/ritual_diviner#dusk)Ritual Diviner [Dusk]$(/l) for easier construction.
(Chest) The location of the inventory that the ritual will grab blocks from to place in the world. $(br) $(li)Maximum Volume: 1 $(li)Horizontal Radius: 3 $(li)Vertical Radius: 3
